info.brief_description: Your life changes when you buy a TV who shrinks people appears in the screen
info.description:
All your life you has dreamed with to have little persons in your hands. One day, you buy a strange TV in an old shop. The salesman tells you if you press a hidden button of the remote control, the person you're watching at the screen appears by magic at your sitting room. But his size will be only 4 inches tall. You'll can play with them.
You are free for write what you want.
